p: The determination of LD 50 was carried out per the results found in the analysis of cell proliferation, which was evaluated by the statistical method of nonlinear regression for both types of cell studied. For this, first we made a curve with five EO concentrations in cell cultures, which were 100, 10, 1, 0.1, and 0.01 μg/mL, obtaining at the end of the analysis LD 50 30.07 μg/mL for human lymphocytes ( Figure 1(a)) and 42.07 μg/mL for human macrophages ( Figure 1(b)).
